query.queryString: select d.department_id 부서번호, d.department_name 부서명, l.city 도시, round(avg(e.salary),0) 평균월급 from departments d, locations l , employees e where d.department_id = e.department_id and l.location_id = d.location_id group by d.department_id, d.department_name,l.city

select d.department_id 부서번호, d.department_name 부서명, l.city 도시, round(avg(e.salary),0) 평균월급 from departments d, locations l , employees e where d.department_id = e.department_id and l.location_id = d.location_id group by d.department_id, d.department_name,l.city having avg(e.salary) between 6000 and 9000

select d.department_id 부서번호, d.department_name 부서명, l.city 도시, round(avg(e.salary),0) 평균월급 from departments d, locations l , employees e where d.department_id = e.department_id and l.location_id = d.location_id group by d.department_id, d.department_name,l.city having avg(e.salary) between 6000 and 9000 order by 4 desc
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name || e.last_name from employees e
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 from employees e
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j where e.job_id = j.job_id
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j where e.job_id = j.job_id and e.manager_id = 108
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j where e.job_id = j.job_id and j.job_title='Finance'
select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.first_name||' '||e.last_name 상사명 from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, e.manager_id 상사명 from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'hh') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar', e.manager_id, 108, 'Nancy Greenberg') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar', e.manager_id,108, 'Nancy Greenberg') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar',108,'dd') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar',108,'Nancy Greenberg') from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'

select e.employee_id 사번, e.first_name ||' '|| e.last_name 사원성명 , j.job_title 직업명, decode(e.manager_id,101, 'Neena Kochhar',108,'Nancy Greenberg') 상사명 from employees e , jobs j, departments d where e.job_id = j.job_id and d.department_id = e.department_id and d.department_name='Finance'
